title: Ben Solomon MD, PhD
text: I am a clinical scholar and attending physician in allergy and immunology at Stanford University.

title: Ben Solomon MD, PhD
text:
Education and training

Stanford University | Fellowship - Allergy and Immunology | July 2022 - June 2024
Stanford University | Residency - Pediatrics | July 2018 - June 2022
Washington University, St. Louis | MD, PhD - Immunology | August 2009 - May 2018
Cornell University | BA - Biology, Philosophy | August 2009 - May 2018
